name: Path
description: Functions for manipulating path data for multihop swaps.

functionDecorators.name: getFirstPool
functionDecorators.description: Gets the segment corresponding to the first pool in the path.

returnDecorators.description: The segment containing all data necessary to target the first pool in the path.

functionDecorators.name: hasMultiplePools
functionDecorators.description: Returns true iff the path contains two or more pools.

returnDecorators.description: True if path contains two or more pools, otherwise false.

functionDecorators.name: numPools
functionDecorators.description: Returns the number of pools in the path.

returnDecorators.description: The number of pools in the path.

functionDecorators.name: skipToken
functionDecorators.description: Skips a token + fee element from the buffer and returns the remainder.

returnDecorators.description: The remaining token + fee elements in the path.
